name: Minecraft: Story Mode - Season Two
description: Together with old pals and new comrades alike, Jesse embarks on a brand new journey filled with tough choices, good times, and at least one temperamental llama.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64Bit Service Pack 1 or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTS 450+ with 1024MB+ VRAM (excluding GT) and Intel HD Graphics 4000+ DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: Direct X 11 sound device Additional Notes: For more detailed specs to optimize the performance of Minecraft: Story Mode - Season Two, please visit: <a href="http://steamcommunity.com/games/639170/announcements/detail/1423551455081257362http://steamcommunity.com/games/639170/announcements/detail/1423551455081403124" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer"  >http://steamcommunity.com/games/639170/announcements/detail/1423551455081257362http://steamcommunity.com/games/639170/announcements/detail/1423551455081403124
